headline: GE Vernova: to help decarbonize the Norwegian grid
summary: GE Vernova has announced the installation of two 420 kV high-voltage products without sulfur hexafluoride for Statnett, the Norwegian transmission system operator , and Equinor. The contract covers...

headline: GE Vernova modernizes Sasol's Secunda power plant in South Africa
summary: * This project serves as a model for modernizing power plants across AfricaCAPE TOWN, South Africa -- The new upgrade increases operational efficiency at Sasol's plant, while reducing NOx emissions...
